name: LoveBuiltLife
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: love built life
des:
Looking for fun, unique, interactive experiences to help you add more creativity to your life? Do you want to add some extra into your ordinary? Well, We’re glad you found us! We offer artsy/crafty classes like Painting, Sewing, Jewelry Making, Art Journaling and more. We also offer lifestyle enrichment classes on topics such as Style, Fashion, Beauty Tips and Emergency Preparedness. 

You can now hear the Love Built Life blog posts in multiple languages including German and Spanish. Just say: "Speak in German" or "Talk to me in Spanish". To change back, just say Speak in English.

You can find out more about Love Built Life at www.LoveBuiltLife.com 

Engage the skill by saying:
Alexa, Open Love Built Life

Once the skill is engaged, try the following commands:
Play the latest blog post
Search for human
Help

**For information about this Alexa skill, visit www.CreateMyVoice.com or send an email to Support@CreateMyVoice.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
